chunks.translated_text:
**Holding the Radiance of the Three Lights**

Holding the splendor of the Three Lights,
Cultivating to refine a single gleam.
Meeting the master, receiving intimate instruction,
The Dao is transmitted in unbroken succession.

**Master Jiang the Second of Copper Ridge Donates a Ritual Drum**

The ritual drum summons the assembly of immortals,
Both humans and heavens rejoice in karmic affinity.
Body and mind alike are offered in devotion,
Virtue and power naturally ascend.

Its sound plucks souls from Avīci’s hell,
Its resonance opens the great Cavern-Heaven.
Revealing the true Dao of filial piety,
When merit is complete, one steps upon cloud chariots.

**Completing the Dao**

Nurturing the Dao, a thousand ailments disperse,
Cultivating the real, the ten thousand methods are void.
Where qi and spirit intertwine,
Nature and life merge in profound obscurity,
Radiance emanates from the mysterious primordial body.

With utmost dedication, boundless merit is upheld,
Gathering in the true workings of creation,
The bright moon and pure wind.

**Offering a Vegetarian Feast**

From all directions, Dao companions gather,
Pure and faithful, they present fragrant offerings.
With right mindfulness, they connect moment by moment,
True merit is arrayed in subtle density.

A hundred spirits contain joy and delight,
A thousand ages revive the withered bones.
Clearly transcending birth and death,
They ascend the jade steps toward the origin.

**For Attendant Cai of the Central Capital**

Attaining the Dao, one transcends life and death,
Yet in the cycle of rebirth, one clings to delusion.
Jade flowers bloom in the Purple Court,
Immortal herbs fill Cao Creek.

The dragon’s pool preserves the golden tiger,
The toad palace gazes upon the sun’s rooster.
If one awakens to even this much,
This alone becomes the ladder to heaven.

**Exhorting the Dao Assembly Below the Hall**

Below the hall, in every station,
Diligently uphold daily practice.
Inner reality must be unburdened,
Outer conduct must be harmonious and complete.

Young and old support one another,
Morning and evening, each reveres the other.
If all can propagate the Dao of filial piety,
They will perceive the true emptiness in the sacred mantra.

**Inviting Dao Assemblies from All Quarters**

In constructing Jade Clarity Abbey,
Each must apply their efforts.
With a shared flow of utmost sincerity,
Patrons exert profound and vast strength.

Segment by segment, like brocade laid out,
Layer by layer, reaching far into the void.
Together, they propagate the true and correct Dao,
Revealing the family tradition beyond the world.

**Further Instructions to the Assembly (Two Poems)**

A single gleam of ancient countenance,
No one can fathom its measure.
The body is born through creation,
Yet turning back, one finds impermanence.

Awakening to the Dao, the heart-spirit shines,
Opening the real, life is prolonged.
When the era of heaven and earth is purified,
Beyond the world, purple mushrooms exude fragrance.

Suddenly comprehending the subtleties of the formless,
Abiding in non-action, guarding the inner visage.
Soaring beyond the floating world,
Merging within the Great Veil’s expanse.

Sun and moon gather in the golden crucible,
Spirit and essence tower like a jade mountain.
When Dao and master-disciple teachings align,
A single strike opens ten thousand barriers.

**Exhorting the Assembly in Early Autumn (Two Poems)**

Emerging from the dog days, autumn gradually cools,
The pure spirit transforms the bones to strength.
The singular spirit expands in freedom,
The dual qi flow in harmony.

The four great elements are all regulated,
The three passes congeal auspicious signs.
The five luminaries revolve anew,
The six viscera naturally find peace.

There is a wondrous and mysterious method,
All manner of karmic transgressions vanish.
When the divine elixir is fully conjoined,
Emerging into the world, one shines even brighter.

Within and without, no trace remains,
The void reveals the constancy of the Dao.
The original true countenance,
The dharma realm is naturally cool.

**Expounding the Dao**

The mysterious origin transmits the great Dao,
The numinous treasure forms the mushroom field.
Water and fire tally their ascent and descent,
Heaven and earth unite in inversion.

Calming the spirit, one observes the moon of nature,
Following each step, the embryo immortals dance.
After a thousand days, true merit is accomplished,
Radiance shines upon the nine heavens.

**Five-Character Quatrain**

**Sent to Master Qiu of Ever-Spring**

Zhaozhou embodies perfect awakening,
Shangshui praises the formless.
Yuyang could not depart,
Ever-Spring alone understood.

**Disciple Liu Wuzhen Asks About Doubtful Matters**

Let all affairs rest,
A thousand demons are all empty.
Cultivate true virtue and conduct,
The bodies of immortals and buddhas are the same.

**Offering at the Three Clarities Abbey on the Lantern Festival**

Once the Lantern Festival is observed,
Disasters vanish, suffering is plucked away.
Illumination descends, heaven and earth are still,
Fortune and prosperity naturally flourish.

**Exhorting the Assembly**

Having become a child who left home,
Do not delay in merit and practice.
Devote the heart truly and sincerely,
Endure hardship, and the Dao will follow.

**Exhorting the Assembly to Assist in Karmic Affinity (Two Poems)**

In nearby halls,
All are urged to lend aid.
Reviving the ancient traces of the true,
Polishing the inner radiance.

Lifetime after lifetime, the sprout of good roots,
Generation after generation, the power of blessings grows.
Spirits and heavens together lend assistance,
When merit is complete, one steps upon cloud mists.

**Reply to Preceptor Li**

Letters arrive in haste,
Yet the true heart does not waver.
With refined bearing, free of self and other,
Beyond the clouds, we become friends.

**For Zhao, the Head of the Binzhou Inn**

Welcoming guests from the three isles,
Sending off visitors from the five lakes.
Teaching meets the Ever-Yang assembly,
Joyfully roaming through the four seasons of spring.

**For Zhang Guangwei, Who Donated His Residence to Build an Abbey**

Your residence transformed into an immortal abbey,
With a pure heart, free of external chatter.
The inner spirit contains joy and delight,
Knowing destiny, free from greed.

**For the Firewood Official of the Capital**

Awakening to the king of the mind,
Emotions wither, ten thousand cares forgotten.
Divine radiance pierces the Purple Court,
The elixir ripens, filling the void with fragrance.

**For Attendant Ma of the Internal Cultivation Bureau**

A kind heart and expansive nature,
Embracing transformation, the inner realm is at peace.
The numinous void is clear and silent,
Forgetting the false, one attains true joy.

**After the Autumnal Equinox Feast, the Assembly Seeks Instruction**

The dharma realm unites in true assembly,
After the feast, resting in the evening cool.
A thousand gates adorn auspicious chrysanthemums,
Ten thousand households celebrate the Double Ninth.

**Reunion with Elder Xing of Zhang Village, Wendeng County, After a Long Separation**

Old friends rejoice again and again,
The true visage gradually unfolds.
Dark demons should be dispelled,
The tranquil nature can be gathered in.

**For Scholar Zhu**

Nobly continuing Master Danyang’s work,
Completing the real, the four great elements are at peace.
The nine mysteries ascend the upper assembly,
A single gleam rides the auspicious simurgh.

**The Three States and Five Assemblies**

Seven-jeweled golden lotus seeds,
Three lights follow jade splendor.
Constantly upholding the conduct of equality,
Each step is an immortal’s home.

**For Wang, the Head of the Wendeng Assembly, Inquiring About Daoist Arts**

Diligently upholding the true great Dao,
Comprehending principle, one soars.
A single gleam connects past and present,
Golden radiance naturally ascends and descends.

**For Sun Wuming of Mizhou**

One gourd contains ten thousand transformations,
Two substances refine the divine elixir.
Awakening to transcend birth and decrease,
Carrying clouds, one steps upon the jade altar.

**Winter Retreat at the Eastern Longzhi Abbey, Laiyang County**

Printing scriptures, purchasing paper and ink,
Retreating for winter at Longzhi.
Mending and gathering the essence of the sun,
Delving into the profound and wondrous principle.

**For the Assembly Hosting a Poverty-Relief Feast**

Viewing old and young as one,
Supporting affinity with broad virtue.
From beginning to end, without change,
What is tread is naturally peaceful.

**Inspiration in Sleep**

Enveloped in five-colored auspicious clouds,
The sagely hosts of the three heavens expound.
Divine spirits incline their ears to listen,
Exhorting and transforming, they urge diligent cultivation of immortality.
chunks.overlap_context:
Home Again**

Master Xin once left home,
Daily hoping to ride clouds and mist.
Yet worldly ties weighed heavily,
Turning the Dao’s principle awry.
Quickly rectify past transgressions,
Again nurture the good root’s sprout.
The enlightened know no before or after,
When merit is complete, Penglai’s isles boast.

**Exhorting Goodness**

The upright assemble with immortals,
All meet with transforming and guiding power.
Evil karmic ties should be reduced,
Good deeds are best when complete and perfect.

chunks.original_text: 张小仙求教 舍破尘劳网，跳出是非坑。 宝鼎存真秀，心花吐月明。 房志明索 补惜真空体，炎精炼玉堂。 倒颠高坎位，续续紫芝香。 李大达索 认正本元道，般般心上扫。 灵明透肌骨，宝鼎祥光罩。 敕修新道院与众尝李果 此果美甘香，灵空真味长。 虚心非冷淡，惟愿众仙尝。 董官人问如何通悟 大道不难通，心灰丹自红。 抽添木上火，补塞蕊珠宫。 莱州张志真问收神定命之理 收神定命基，方可应玄微。 进火添丹鼎，朝元指日归。 霍会首问三教归一 无生真妙道，达本体同然。 吾教冥归一，通融理自全。 孙一翁见子出家大哭故赠之 贩骨如山岳，时来暂托生。 保朝不保暮，出离是前程。 题丹阳百不歌 百不如意处，茅卢土穴潜。 静清消旧业，一味道中恬。 试睡语 一气号玄精，全真自降灵。 回还无漏泄，步步到天庭。 赠刘真一 巧使千端计，阴公暗折磨。 不施平等行，回首梦南柯。 赠中都赵知观 顿忘天下欲，渐赴大罗乡。 日月交光绽，灵明满十方。 于周问吉凶 逐处有凶吉，心乖赶避难。 百年随手过，觉则道中看。 自在 处世如虚空，浮生似梦间。 悟真超造化，步步出尘寰。 杨公出药求教 壶中一粒丹，心肾两相关。 水火真加减，服之见本颜。 于志常问清闲 平等元神定，逍遥玉性闲。 心空观自在，一脱万重关。 孟知常合药索 性若金刚利，心如大藏宽。 结攒元气髓，和合紫金丹。 买文登七宝堂观额 七宝丹霞观，通光结胜缘。 万灵同庆会，百福自周圆。 贸宁海州金莲堂观额 宁海龙祥观，金莲顺化生。 福星都结聚，道德自然成。 禅师问道 悟达真空体，无生自往还。 物情俱丧灭，唯现亘初颜。 赠滨州高官人 天堂非路远，俗眷岂能长。 悟道归真理，全神纳伯祥。 劝棣州崔殿试入道二首 存心养道芽，尤胜度仙槎。 聚合真三宝，丹成步彩霞。 催行真大道，遇理起生涯。 一片清虚境，逍遥度岁华。 赠福山刘－翁 善恶两还报，贤愚不并酬。 百年随手过，都在眼前头。 赠道士张守道 归依无上道，守得水银红。 性命还元主，清音聒太空。 谢人施物 善性崇三宝，真恩彻九霄。 全家重志庆，似我乐逍遥。 中介于少翁命禄尽祷余接寿 大海无根树，令余苦接栽。 舍身难用力，石火岂回来。 赞火德星君 混元一气主，化生天地人。 明真超法界，济物妙通神。 明天道 恢恢天道大，不与物情同。 悟达真如理，归源却返空。 行化 东海西秦去，南京北阙来。 客尘都不染，端坐是蓬莱。 嵘山采药 放荡真如性，逍遥养内丹。 寸灵无彼我，百草变芝兰。 〔赠郝公门人〕 太古郝公升霞，门人送道袍，不受。 以此赠之。 彼物回将去，分文没往还。
chunks.translated_text:
**Zhang Xiaoxian Seeks Instruction**
Abandoning the tattered net of worldly toil,
Leaping free from the pit of right and wrong.
Within the precious tripod, true beauty is preserved;
The flower of the heart blooms with moonlight’s glow.

**For Fang Zhiming’s Request**
Cherish and mend the body of true emptiness,
Refining the essence of fire to jade the hall.
Inverting the lofty Kan and Li positions,
Evermore the purple mushroom’s fragrance lingers.

**For Li Dada’s Request**
Recognize the original, fundamental Dao,
Sweeping away each and every thought.
Spiritual clarity pierces flesh and bone,
The precious tripod enveloped in auspicious light.

**Imperial Commission to Renovate a New Daoist Abbey, Sharing Plum Fruits with the Assembly**
This fruit is sweet and fragrant,
Its numinous emptiness holds the true flavor’s lasting essence.
An open heart is not cold indifference—
Only wishing all immortals to partake.

**Prefect Dong Asks How to Attain Enlightenment**
The Great Dao is not hard to fathom—
When the heart turns to ash, the elixir naturally glows red.
Drawing and adding fire upon wood,
Sealing and filling the Palace of the Jeweled Bud.

**Laizhou’s Zhang Zhizhen Asks About the Principle of Gathering Spirit and Stabilizing Life**
Gathering spirit and stabilizing life is the foundation,
Only then can one respond to the subtle and mysterious.
Advancing the fire to augment the elixir tripod,
Pointing toward the day of returning to the origin.

**Hu Hui, the Assembly Leader, Asks About the Three Teachings Returning to One**
The wondrous Dao of non-birth,
Penetrates the original substance as one.
Our teaching darkly returns to unity,
Through fusion, the principle is naturally complete.

**For Elder Sun Yiweng, Who Wept Upon Seeing Me Leave Home**
Piling bones like mountains,
One borrows life for a fleeting moment when the time comes.
Securing the morning does not secure the evening—
Departure is the path ahead.

**Inscription on "The Hundred Discontents" of Danyang**
In the hundred discontented places,
One hides in thatched huts and earthen caves.
In stillness and purity, past karma dissolves,
Abiding in the Dao’s serene flavor.

**Words Spoken in Test Sleep**
A single qi is called mysterious essence,
The perfected true self descends in spirit.
In returning and cycling, nothing leaks—
Step by step, one ascends to the celestial court.

**For Liu Zhenyi**
Crafting a thousand schemes,
The hidden lord silently wears one down.
Without practicing impartial conduct,
One awakens to a dream in Nanke.

**For Zhao Zhiguan of Zhongdu**
Suddenly forgetting worldly desires,
Gradually advancing toward the Great Luo realm.
Sun and moon intertwine their radiance,
Spiritual clarity fills the ten directions.

**Yu Zhou Asks About Fortune and Misfortune**
Wherever one goes, fortune and misfortune follow—
A deviant heart hastens to avoid calamity.
A hundred years pass in an instant,
Awakening, one sees it all within the Dao.

**At Ease**
Dwelling in the world like empty space,
Floating life resembles a dream’s interval.
Awakening to truth transcends creation,
Step by step, one emerges from the dusty realm.

**Yang the Elder Presents Medicine and Seeks Instruction**
Within the crucible, a single grain of elixir,
Heart and kidneys in mutual resonance.
True water and fire in addition and subtraction—
Consuming it, one beholds the original countenance.

**Yu Zhichang Asks About Leisure**
The primordial spirit settles in equality,
Carefree, the jade nature is at ease.
With an empty heart, one observes freedom,
Shedding ten thousand layers of barriers.

**Meng Zhichang Requests a Formula for Compounding Medicine**
A nature sharp as vajra,
A heart as vast as the Great Treasury.
Gathering the marrow of original qi,
Harmonizing the purple-gold elixir.

**Purchasing the Plaque for the Seven Treasures Hall in Wendeng**
The Seven Treasures Hall amid cinnabar clouds,
Radiant light forges an excellent affinity.
Ten thousand spirits gather in celebration,
A hundred blessings naturally come full circle.

**Purchasing the Plaque for the Golden Lotus Hall in Ninghai Prefecture**
The Dragon’s Auspicious Abbey in Ninghai,
Golden lotuses arise in accord with transformation.
Fortune stars assemble in confluence,
Virtue and power naturally attain completion.

**A Chan Master Asks About the Dao**
Awakening to the body of true emptiness,
Non-birth moves of its own accord.
Worldly attachments all perish,
Only the everlasting original face appears.

**For Prefect Gao of Binzhou**
Heaven’s court is not far away,
But worldly attachments cannot endure.
Awakening to the Dao, returning to true principle,
Preserving spirit, one embraces great fortune.

**Two Poems Exhorting Cui Dianshi of Dezhou to Enter the Dao**
Nurturing the Dao’s sprout within the heart
Surpasses sailing a transcendent raft.
Gathering the true Three Treasures,
Once the elixir forms, one steps upon rosy clouds.

Urging the practice of the true Great Dao,
Encountering principle, one begins life’s work.
A realm of pure emptiness,
Carefree, one passes the years.

**For Elder Liu of Fushan**
Good and evil each return their due,
Wise and foolish are not rewarded alike.
A hundred years pass in an instant—
All unfolds before one’s eyes.

**For Daoist Zhang Shoudao**
Taking refuge in the supreme Dao,
Preserving the reddened mercury.
Life and destiny return to the original master,
A pure sound resounds through the vast sky.

**In Gratitude for Offerings**
The virtuous nature venerates the Three Treasures,
True kindness pierces the nine heavens.
The whole family rejoices in profound celebration,
Like me, delighting in carefree wandering.

**For Yu Shaoweng, Whose Fate Is Exhausted, Praying for Me to Extend His Lifespan**
The rootless tree upon the vast sea,
I am entreated to graft it with suffering.
Abandoning the body is of little use—
Can the spark from stone ever return?

**In Praise of the Fire Virtue Star Lord**
The primordial master of a single qi,
Giving birth to heaven, earth, and humanity.
Illuminating truth beyond the dharma realms,
Aiding beings with wondrous spiritual penetration.

**Illuminating the Dao of Heaven**
Vast and boundless, the Dao of heaven,
Not the same as worldly sentiments.
Awakening to the principle of true suchness,
Returning to the source, one reverts to emptiness.

**Spreading Transformation**
From the Eastern Sea to the Western Qin,
From Nanjing to the Northern Palace they come.
Worldly dust does not cling—
Sitting upright, this is Penglai.

**Gathering Herbs on Mount Rong**
The true suchness nature roams freely,
Carefree, nurturing the inner elixir.
An inch of spirit without self or other,
A hundred herbs transform into orchids and mushrooms.

**For Master Hao’s Disciples**
In ancient times, Master Hao ascended in rosy clouds.
His disciples offered a Daoist robe, which he refused,
Returning it with these words:
Take back those things,
Not a single coin will be exchanged.

chunks.original_text: 一灵真性在，脱尽死生关。 述怀 亘初无相物，默默独歌欢。 动静还元主，玄风幸得观。 文登择福地作丹霞观二首 三宝兴缘地，诸公可察详。 不唯身富贵，更得性清凉。 万事信天然，随方结善缘。 一壶藏造化，四序景新鲜。 顺天者昌 好事如山岳，精持每用功。 立身弘大道，法性自圆融。 逆天者亡 奸懒心机巧，顽情不顺天。 教门真患害，地狱苦因缘。 出尘 一点真如性，居尘不染尘。 虚无元体段，脱洒度天人。 颂 〔警示〕 昔在牟平县沽水庄迟二翁宅，说教大露天机，全家跪听，皆如聋者。 及见迟公寿数不长，故以言警之。 休把黄泉戏弄，全体内怀珍重。 违天百祸临身，达道万灵感动。 宣在都下众官赠衣物并鞍马不受 欲躲生老病苦，叮嘱宜修仙举。 忘情绝了尘缘，万化还归本主。 〔赠朝元子〕 朝元子刘公精诚奉道，施惠过多。 欲因此颂，激励出尘之心。 欲求长生之因休心，欲了自然之道拂袖。 欲修真实福田济人，欲作扶缘演教和光。 泰安州王禀告全家入道 异哉王禀全家，各修清静根芽。 分别争逃死路，炼烹日月精华。 述怀 昔日区区守道，今时真圣应报。 大罗玉簿名句，后学修仙早早。 卢宣武索 大道开辟以来，无相化生万类。 人还物我同观，返照深根固蒂。 行化至薄台县失马寄呈朝元公详察 失马虚空一化，的望朝元清雅。 欢心体用仙机，别有祥鸾稳跨。 赠棣州防御七驸马 为官王事所拘，学道虚空掌管。 四民各艺争忙，达者不论长短。 赠马悟真 悟真全然去假，缚住心猿意马。 宝宫虎斗龙蟠，赤凤青鸾稳跨。 马智真索 内炼本容变化，一气冲和上下。 脱尘认得圆明，皓月清风会话。 寄东乡道众 稽首东方法会，道要真心不退。 各怀一志精专，照破万缘无昧。 因小辈讪谤作 小儿尖唇利舌，不欲人前分别。 皆因泯绝是非，故得出离生灭。 缘兹加遇三宣，独步清风明月。 莫待拂袖云归，的有含悲哽噎。 赠诸处道众 既作同流，莫学奇怪。 四序炎凉，三光否泰。 清净教风，勿令懈怠。 道弟道兄，洗心宁耐。 竭力奉公，事缘洪大。 外谢神天，内持真戒。 全体光明，并除阴债。 绝尽旧业，洞观无碍。 入众妙门，炼真无坏。 个个投真，人人悟解。 升入无形，徧含法界。 一点灵光，古今常在。 赠老王先生二首 龙虎坎离，铅汞婴姹。 异像无穷，一气自在。 龙行雨施，拂座香随。 人怀道德，万化扶持。 得道二首 大道本宗，天地否泰。 出离我身，混元三界。 灵宝金丹，颠倒循环。 壶中日月，轻骨回颜。 劝缘 伏望诸公，好事推穷。
chunks.translated_text:
**The True Nature of the Single Spirit**
The true nature of the single spirit abides,
Transcending the barrier of death and life.

**Expressing My Feelings**
From the beginning, formless things exist,
In silence, I sing alone with joy.
In movement and stillness, returning to the original master,
Fortunate to witness the mysterious wind.

**Two Poems on Selecting a Blessed Site in Wendeng to Build Danxia Abbey**
A place where the Three Treasures flourish,
All should examine it in detail.
Not only does the body gain wealth and honor,
But the nature attains cool clarity.
All things trust in heaven’s natural course,
Forming good affinities wherever one goes.
A gourd holds creation’s workings,
The four seasons ever fresh in scenery.

**Those Who Follow Heaven Prosper**
Good deeds are like mountains,
Diligently cultivated with constant effort.
Establishing oneself in the great Dao,
The dharma-nature naturally harmonizes.

**Those Who Defy Heaven Perish**
Cunning and lazy, scheming with guile,
Stubborn emotions defy heaven’s will.
True harm to the teachings,
Bitter karmic ties to hell.

**Transcending the Dust**
A single speck of true suchness,
Dwelling in the dust yet unstained.
The original substance of emptiness,
Unfettered, transcending heaven and humanity.

**A Chant [Warning]**
Once, in Gusui Village of Muping County,
I expounded the teachings, revealing heaven’s secrets.
The entire household knelt to listen,
Yet all were as deaf.
Seeing that Elder Chi’s lifespan was short,
I warned him with these words:
Do not trifle with the Yellow Springs,
Cherish your whole being within.
Defying heaven brings a hundred calamities,
Attaining the Dao moves ten thousand spirits.

**Declining Gifts of Robes, Horses, and Saddle from Officials in the Capital**
To escape the suffering of birth, old age, sickness, and death,
I urge you to cultivate the ascent to immortality.
Forget emotions, sever worldly ties,
All transformations return to the original master.

**For Master Chaoyuan**
Master Chaoyuan, Liu, devoted to the Dao with utmost sincerity,
Has bestowed boundless kindness.
Through this chant, I seek
To stir the heart that transcends the dust:
To seek the cause of longevity, quiet the mind;
To comprehend the Dao of nature, sweep away distractions.
To cultivate the true field of blessings and aid others,
To support affinities, propagate the teachings, and harmonize with light.

**Wang of Tai’an Prefecture Announces His Entire Family’s Entry into the Dao**
Remarkable, Wang and his whole family,
Each nurturing the root of purity.
Striving to escape the path of death,
Refining and stewing the essence of sun and moon.

**Expressing My Feelings**
Once, I humbly guarded the Dao,
Now, the true sage’s retribution arrives.
My name inscribed in the Jade Record of the Great Luo,
Later learners, hasten to cultivate immortality.

**Requested by Lu Xuanwu**
Since the Dao’s inception,
The formless has transformed all things.
Viewing self and others as one,
Reflect inward to deepen the root and firm the stem.

**Losing a Horse While Spreading the Teachings in Botai County, Sent to Master Chaoyuan for Consideration**
The lost horse, an empty transformation,
Yet I hope for Chaoyuan’s refined grace.
With joy, embody the subtle workings of immortality,
Another auspicious phoenix awaits a steady ride.

**For the Seventh Imperial Son-in-Law, Defender of Dizhou**
Bound by official duties,
Yet learning to govern the emptiness of the Dao.
The four classes busy with their crafts,
The enlightened disregard length or brevity.

**For Ma Wuzhen**
Wuzhen has wholly shed falsity,
Tethering the monkey-mind and horse-will.
In the treasure palace, tiger and dragon coil,
Red phoenix and blue simurgh ride steady.

**Requested by Ma Zhizhen**
Internal refinement allows transformation,
A single qi harmonizing above and below.
Transcending the dust, recognizing perfect clarity,
Conversing in the bright moon and clear wind.

**To the Daoist Assembly in Dongxiang**
I bow to the eastern method assembly,
The Dao’s essence lies in unwavering sincerity.
Each harbors a single-minded devotion,
Illuminating all conditions without obscurity.

**Composed Upon Being Slandered by the Young**
Young ones with sharp lips and quick tongues,
Unwilling to distinguish right before others.
All because they extinguish right and wrong,
Thus they escape birth and death.
Through these encounters with three summons,
I walk alone in the clear wind and bright moon.
Do not wait until sweeping my sleeves to depart,
For there will be only sorrow and choked sobs.

**For Daoist Assemblies Everywhere**
Having joined the same current,
Do not pursue the strange.
Through the four seasons’ heat and cold,
The three luminaries’ decline and prosperity.
Preserve the pure teachings’ wind,
Never grow lax.
Daoist brothers,
Purify your hearts and endure.
Exert yourselves for the public good,
For the great affair of karmic conditions.
Externally, repay the gods and heaven,
Internally, uphold the true precepts.
The whole being radiant and bright,
Settle all karmic debts.
Eradicate past deeds,
Perceive without obstruction.
Enter the gate of myriad wonders,
Refine the indestructible true.
Each one devotes to the real,
Every person awakens and understands.
Ascend into the formless,
Pervading the dharma-realm.
A single spark of spirit,
Abides through ancient and modern times.

**Two Poems for Elder Master Wang**
Dragon and tiger, water and fire,
Lead and mercury, infant and maiden.
Endless transformations,
A single qi, free and at ease.
Dragons move, rain descends,
Incense follows the seat.
Embodying virtue and power,
All transformations lend support.

**Two Poems on Attaining the Dao**
The great Dao’s original source,
Heaven and earth’s decline and prosperity.
Emerging from my own body,
The primordial chaos of the three realms.
The numinous treasure of golden elixir,
Reversing the cycle.
Within the gourd, sun and moon,
Light bones, restore youth.

**Exhorting Karmic Conditions**
I implore all,
To thoroughly pursue good deeds.

chunks.original_text: 一心齐力，大教兴洪。 杨先生问本来模样 无形无相，化生心上。 趁有着空，本来模样。 初守道住庵求教 学道同初，抱守神珠。 证明三宝，不动如如。 于了一问心地 心是汝师，莫放东西。 其中一点，莲出青泥。 姜哥问住庵三首 独坐茅卢，般若灵虚。 手传日月，安在鼎炉。 世事一拨，推穷本末。 物外全真，心死命活。 修真体道，洪护正宗。 三教万法，普济无穷。 赠滨州李四郎七首 心是道，道是心。 心合道，古今通。 心办道，性然香。 真一点，出昆冈。 心了悟，性灵明。 真自在，达圆成。 心无影，性无形。 神光绽，辊金精。 心守道，性持斋。 行与俚，是蓬莱。 心了了，性休休。 真无漏，住悠悠。 人我死，物情休。 真大道，了无忧。 〔五言排律〕 金丹诀

With one heart and united strength,

**Master Yang Asks of the Original Form**
Formless and without appearance,

The original form.

**First Seeking the Dao While Dwelling in a Hut**
Learning the Dao from the beginning,
Embracing and guarding the spirit pearl.
Witnessing the Three Treasures,

The heart is your master,
Do not let it wander east or west.
Within it, a single point—

**Three Poems for Brother Jiang on Dwelling in a Hut**
Sitting alone in a thatched hut,
Prajñā’s numinous emptiness.
Handing down sun and moon,
Resting in the tripod and furnace.
Worldly affairs, once swept aside,
Pursue their root and end.
Beyond phenomena, preserving the true,
The heart dies, the life lives.

**Cultivating the True and Embodying the Dao**
Vastly protecting the orthodox lineage.
The Three Teachings and ten thousand dharmas,
Universally aiding without limit.

**Seven Poems for Li Silang of Binzhou**
The heart is the Dao, the Dao is the heart.
Heart and Dao unite—ancient and modern flow as one.
The heart accomplishes the Dao, nature ignites incense.

The heart awakens, nature’s spirit brightens.
Truly at ease, attaining perfect completion.
The heart leaves no shadow, nature no form.
Divine radiance bursts forth, refining golden essence.

The heart guards the Dao, nature upholds the fast.
Walking with the rustic, this is Penglai.
The heart is clear, nature at rest.
Truly without leakage, dwelling in the eternal.

Self and others die, worldly passions cease.
The true great Dao—ultimate freedom from care.

Emerging from my own body,

chunks.original_text: 酒色财气绝，世事般般彻。 三尸阴魄消，六贼十恶灭。 魔山竭底摧，都休乱扭捏。 乞食纸布衣，顿把心猿歇。 一意不真常，慧刀分两截。 动静两俱忘，不得夸清洁。 性命稳栽排，深藏精气血。 万神自欢谐，灵风透骨节。 上赓朱灵宫，下通龙虎穴。 保养气精神，慎勿轻心泄。 四海发云光，三山落白雪。 际会玄元宫，绵绵无断绝。 水火自抽添，周天自摆列。 神气自然灵，真师自提挈。 百骸自豁畅，容貌自然别。 日月自循环，金丹自然结。 婴儿自然欣，姹女自欢悦。 五气自朝元，四大俱调摄。 玄理自然通，万神自超越。 大道自然成，陆地自然别。 定正个中真，暗把心香爇。 光散化成神，神光如电掣。 锻炼大丹成，现出家家月。 一撞过三关，仙班云外别。 开廓天地清，阴灵飘荡彻。 日月交光转，参罗碧凛冽。 圆光满世间，说中非有说。 九转大丹成，永永超生灭。 清歌聒太空，浩浩朝金阙。 混元三界中，嘱付叮咛切。 东牟王一书，传此金丹诀。 歌 朝元歌 灵宝堂，金刚纂，不假浮沉空漫漫。 默运天心不动移，投神一点空无绊。 辊金精，自浇灌，凑聚烟霞天外伴。 开关纯阳运化生，玄宫法界都穿贯。 喜颜红，真无乱，万古精魂都着岸。 混沌重开显正宗，玄元宝壁时堪玩。 感皇恩，明诏唤，两帝三宣功德案。 紫衣师号朝圣明，万灵庆会都来窜。 透三光，昭洞焕，一体通融无间断。 杳杳虚空道自然，五明攒罩清凉馆。 走云光，金雷散，诸地诸天呈手段。 赫赫神光晃太虚，亘容浩浩超云汉。 皓月堂，圆明观，玉象金狮游内院。 下振黄泉竭底清，太平涌涌神交换。 归去来，无打算，三界十方光渐满。 四大空无一点尘，留传大道谁当管。 会真歌 会真歌，会真歌，宿骨灵光事若何。 不论物情真富贵，无穷无漏道根科。 真一点，没言多，空色色空莫问他。 心灭情忘离幻境，撮挐性命上高坡。 真妙用，养冲和，抱一无离谨琢磨。 混洞赤文超造化，无形水火出娑婆。 真内宝，绝沈痾，暗度清琳九曲河。 二十四锤金锁骨，尾闾关节枕鳌哦。 频烹炼，莫蹉跎，日月流光出黑波。 颠倒循环清宇宙，须知回首看南柯。 重清爽，涤昏魔，一颗圆明世莫过。 守壳盈躯随分饱，不亲世上假偻罗。 金雷吼，玉人呵，脱体全空一剎那。 无极诸天洪正教，十方三界普周罗。 普救歌　和丹阳韵攒三拆字 □□三人遭大遇，□□性命安闲处。 □□清裹得真欢，□□相投真实语。 真实语，□□铅散汉锺吕。 □□结就紫金丹，□□汞中得真趣。 □□神气永绵绵，□□明中自歌舞。 自歌舞，□□重阳居环堵。 □□道论量仁马，□□出现真龙虎。 □□回光三界中，□□下方来济度。 □□我度出幽冥，□□从此离尘土。 □□锺声更莫言，□□问之归紫府。 归紫府，□□信受没为拒。 □□闻说我宗风，□□天人无譬誉。 #1 吟
chunks.translated_text:
Cut off wine, lust, wealth, and temper—
every worldly affair thoroughly seen through.
The Three Corpses’ yin spirits dissolve,
the Six Bandits and ten evils perish.
The demon mountain crumbles to its base,
all restless pretense ceases.
Begging for food in paper and cloth robes,
suddenly the Heart-Monkey rests.
A single intent not truly constant—
the Wisdom Blade cleaves it in two.
Movement and stillness both forgotten,
one must not boast of purity.
Life and nature firmly planted,
essence, qi, and blood deeply stored.
The ten thousand spirits rejoice in harmony,
a numinous breeze penetrates the bones and joints.
Above, it joins the Vermilion Spirit Palace;
below, it connects to the Dragon-Tiger Cavern.
Nurture the qi and spirit with care,
never lightly leaking the heart’s essence.
The four seas emit clouds of light,
the three mountains are blanketed in white snow.
At the meeting in the Mysterious Origin Palace,
it flows ceaselessly, unbroken.
Water and fire naturally ebb and flow,
the Celestial Cycle arranges itself.
Spirit and qi become inherently numinous,
the true master lifts and guides.
The hundred bones grow freely unobstructed,
the countenance naturally transforms.
Sun and moon revolve of themselves,
the Golden Elixir coalesces naturally.
The Infant rejoices of itself,
the Maiden delights in herself.
The Five Qi ascend to the Origin,
the Four Great are all harmonized.
The Mysterious Principle naturally penetrates,
the ten thousand spirits transcend themselves.
The Great Dao naturally fulfills,
the earthly realm naturally differs.
Stabilize the true within,
secretly kindle the heart’s incense.
Light scatters, transforming into spirit—
the spirit’s radiance flashes like lightning.
The Great Elixir refined to completion,
the moon of every household appears.
A single strike passes the Three Passes,
the immortal ranks stand apart beyond the clouds.
The heavens and earth open vast and clear,
yin spirits drift away, utterly dispersed.
Sun and moon exchange their radiance,
the Three Stars gleam cold and bright.
A perfect halo fills the world,
within its discourse, there is no discourse.
The Nine-Turned Great Elixir accomplished,
eternally transcending birth and death.
Pure songs resound through the great void,
boundless, they ascend to the Golden Portal.
Within the Primordial Unity of the Three Realms,
the charge is earnest and urgent.
A single book from King Dongmu—
this Golden Elixir Formula is transmitted.

**[Song of Ascending to the Origin]**
The Numinous Treasure Hall, the Vajra Compilation—
no need for floating or sinking in boundless emptiness.
Silently revolving the Heavenly Heart, unmoving and unshifting,
a single point of spirit is cast, unobstructed in the void.
Refining golden essence, naturally irrigating,
gathering mist and rosy clouds as companions beyond the heavens.
Opening the Pass, Pure Yang circulates and transforms life—
the Mysterious Palace and Dharma Realm are all pervaded.
Joyful countenance, crimson—truly undisturbed,
the ancient spirit-souls all reach the shore.
The Primordial Chaos reopens, revealing the True Lineage,
the Mysterious Origin’s precious wall is now fit for contemplation.
Grateful for the imperial grace, the enlightened decree summons—
the records of merit for the Two Emperors and Three Proclamations.
The Purple-Robed Master’s title is conferred in the sacred court,
the myriad spirits in celebration all come rushing.
Piercing the Three Lights, shining and resplendent,
a single body flows through without interruption.
Vast and distant, the void—Dao naturally,
the Five Clarities gather, veiling the Cool Pavilion.
Clouds of light surge, golden thunder scatters—
all lands and heavens display their arts.
Brilliant and majestic, the spirit’s radiance illumines the great void,
its boundless presence soars beyond the Milky Way.
The Bright Moon Hall, the Perfect Clarity Abbey—
jade elephants and golden lions roam the inner courtyard.
Below, it shakes the Yellow Springs to their depths, utterly purified,
the Great Peace surges, spirits intermingle and transform.
Return, come away—no need for calculation.
Within the Three Realms and ten directions, light gradually fills.
The Four Great are empty, without a speck of dust—
who shall take up the transmission of the Great Dao?

**[Song of Meeting the True]**
*Song of Meeting the True, Song of Meeting the True—*
what of the luminous spirit within the old bones?
Not regarding worldly passions as true wealth,
the root of the inexhaustible, untainted Dao.
A single true point—no need for many words.
Form is emptiness, emptiness is form—ask not of it.
The heart extinguished, passions forgotten, departing illusory realms,
gathering life and nature to ascend the high slope.
The true wondrous work nurtures harmony,
embracing the One without separation, carefully refining.
The Crimson Text of the Primal Chaos transcends creation,
formless water and fire emerge from the world of suffering.
The true inner treasure severs deep afflictions,
silently crossing the Nine-Bend River of pure nectar.
Twenty-four hammer strikes forge the golden-locked bones,
the Tailbone Pass and joints rest upon the turtle’s back.
Frequently refine, let no time slip away—
sun and moon’s flowing light emerges from dark waves.
Reversing the cycle, the pure universe,
know to turn back and gaze upon the Southern Branch.
Again clear and bright, dispelling the demon of confusion,
a single orb of perfect clarity—none in the world surpass it.
Guarding the shell, filling the body to satisfaction,
not clinging to the world’s false adornments.
Golden thunder roars, the Jade Person scolds—
in an instant, the body is wholly emptied.
The Great Orthodox Teaching of the Limitless Heavens,
pervading the ten directions and Three Realms.

**[Song of Universal Salvation]**
*(To the tune of Dan Yang, with three-character lines interspersed)*
□□ three persons encounter a great meeting,
□□ life and nature rest in tranquility.
□□ within the pure, true joy is found,
□□ in mutual accord, true words spoken.
True words—
□□ lead and mercury scatter, Han Zhong and Lü.
□□ the Purple Gold Elixir is formed,
□□ within the mercury, true delight is found.
□□ spirit and qi eternally continuous,
□□ within the light, they dance of themselves.
Dancing of themselves—
□□ Chongyang dwells in humble abode.
□□ discoursing on the Dao, measuring benevolence and horses,
□□ the true Dragon and Tiger appear.
□□ turning the light back within the Three Realms,
□□ descending to the lower realms to deliver salvation.
□□ I deliver from the nether darkness,
□□ from this, departing the dusty world.
□□ the bell’s toll—no more words,
□□ inquire and return to the Purple Palace.
Return to the Purple Palace—
□□ trust and accept, not refusing.
□□ hearing of our sect’s tradition,
□□ heaven and humanity are beyond compare.

chunks.original_text: 得道吟 自从一得长生诀，万里天光如电掣。 日月精华补漏源，真空水火凝交结。 运行真气结灵砂，道骨仙风碧凛冽。 七宝金莲晃太虚，三宫朗照秋天月。 顿开万法没言诠，浩劫之家莫可越。 盖古腾今一点真，诸天济会同参谒。 养浩吟 虚无一气浩然新，四假包罗无价珍。 仙命莫令尘惹绊，苦空不得话艰辛。 颐真养性存精秀，聚汞烹铅守谷神。 一气升腾超造化，二仪变炼会初真。 周天加减留年药，全道滋荣妙色身。 斡运内丹凭火候，载般乌兔走蟾轮。 三田应化灵宫雪，五脏冲和甘露津。 内宝完全无漏果，纯阳混合古今因。 清音历历动山鬼，云宴喧喧聒海滨。 会遇诸天弘大教，时逢圣帝御严宸。 惟祈忠佐千秋岁，仰祝皇基万万春。 大德大功成大道，大罗重会旧交亲。 妙化吟 普化清心公，清心道合同。 般般心上扫，物物莫推穷。 定性存今古，颐神续祖宗。 遇师亲说破，默默步云踪。 妙物腾空起，玄珠落绛宫。 绵绵调玉虎，细细运朱龙。 赤凤舒金翅，青鸾舞太空。 神炉烹玉貌，金鼎铸朱容。 表裹光明结，丹台雪暖红。 了真超造化，明月与清风。 开化吟 无为清净内修完，始遇天元道不难。 自得无生相混合，玄都灵物锁幽关。 炎炎大气空升降，赫赫天光辊玉坛。 寂寂万神空裹坠，亭亭元宝接昆山。 攒攒玉姹投玄谷，聚聚金婴列瑞班。 处处青莲开满日，空空玄象始归还。 腾腾五色圆光台，灿灿流霞万化攒。 细细神风轻缥缈，灵灵金相自妆銮。 清清宝璧盘桓住，净净灵砂透骨欢。 默默了真非有说，明明全道事都删。 玄玄守护真三宝，妙妙功成一颗丹。 浩浩银霞常覆罩，辉辉玉性自追攀。 飘飘舞袖超三界，混混朝元显内颜。 朗朗闲如秋夜月，炜炜常在玉霄间。 惺惺了了仙家乐，湛湛澄澄道性闲。 旷劫真容离苦海，古今圆象出波澜。 大罗一会同归去，悟理明真子细看。 显道吟 芸芸悬象满空飞，应报人天万化机。 绝妙神仙留秘诀，须知父母未生时。 阴阳造化全真理，一点灵光总不知。 混沌变通超物外，内灵随步蹑云梯。 先天圆觉真空体，性命含光天地齐，百骨通灵心悦乐，无情童子笑微微。 洗心法雨明浇灌，开道光明出污泥。 般运珠珍通上下，抽添水火并东西。 玄元四大开心印，秘典灵文越世奇。 句句只敲心髓病，言言直指达无为。 逍遥叮嘱长生理，暗合天真不动移。 传道洪缘玉阳子，济危拔苦度愚迷。 真一吟 真孝真慈真校量，真心真遇聚真凉。 真师真诀通真炼，真行真功真道场。 真静真清真大道，真玄真妙结真祥。 真明真悟真无漏，真语真言合上苍。 真虎真龙真造化，真山真水养和光。 真闲真乐真无染，真圣真贤满十方。 真性真容真洒落，真禅真道显真常。 真天真地布真德，真圣真仙处处香。 青童吟 寂寂寥寥一醉中，萧萧洒洒喜颜红。 清清静静全真理，默默虚虚守内容。 细细绵绵吞紫瑞，澄澄察察饮霞风。 盈盈聚聚天光结，杳杳冥冥立祖宗。 遇遇遭遭超彼岸，端端的的话真空。 灵灵俏俏仙家乐，喜喜欢欢度岁丰。 回光吟 告暇得回归，修真不动移。 化缘离苦厄，贤友作交知。 随处同参论，人天度众迷。 六尘通旧塞，三宝妙精持。 空外玄光聚，神明不敢欺。 清风贯四大，皓月整容仪。 白首全今古，金身括四维。
chunks.translated_text:
**Chant of Attaining the Dao**

Since first obtaining the long-life formula,
The light of ten thousand miles flashes like lightning.
The essences of sun and moon mend the leaking source,
True emptiness and water-fire congeal in union.
Circulating true qi, the numinous cinnabar forms,
Dao-bones and immortal winds—azure and piercing chill.
Seven-jeweled golden lotuses gleam in the great void,
The Three Palaces brightly illumine the autumn moon.
Suddenly all dharmas open, beyond words or explanation,
The household of kalpas cannot be transcended.
From ancient times to now, this single truth endures,
All heavens gather in assembly to pay homage together.

---

**Chant of Nurturing the Vast**

Vacuous and boundless, one qi newly vast,
The Four Temporaries embrace priceless treasures.
Let not the immortal life be snared by dust,
Nor speak of bitter emptiness and hardship’s sting.
Nurture truth, cultivate nature, preserve essence’s bloom,
Gather mercury, refine lead, guard the Valley Spirit.
One qi ascends, transcending creation’s bounds,
The Two Modes transform and temper, meeting the Primal True.
The Zhou-Tian’s wax and wane yields the elixir of years,
The full Dao flourishes the wondrous colored body.
Revolving the inner elixir by fire’s timing,
Bearing sun and moon, the toad-wheel swiftly turns.
The Three Fields transform into the numinous palace’s snow,
The Five Viscera harmonize, sweet dew’s nectar flows.
The inner treasure complete—the fruit of no leakage,
Pure Yang merges, the cause of past and present.
Clear tones, distinct, stir mountain spirits,
Cloud feasts clamor, resounding by the sea’s edge.
Meeting all heavens to propagate the great teaching,
Timely encountering the Sage Emperor enthroned in majesty.
Only pray for loyal aid through a thousand autumns,
Gazing upward to bless the imperial foundation for ten thousand springs.
Great virtue, great merit—accomplishing the great Dao,
The Great Net once more gathers old friends and kin.

---

**Chant of Wondrous Transformation**

The Master of Universal Transformation, pure of heart,
Pure heart and Dao unite as one.
Sweep away each and every thought,
Let no thing be pushed to its limit.
Stabilize nature, preserving past and present,
Nurture spirit, continuing the ancestral line.
Meeting the master, the secret is personally revealed,
Silently following the cloud’s trace.
Wondrous things soar into the void,
The Mystic Pearl falls into the Crimson Palace.
Endlessly harmonizing the Jade Tiger,
Gently moving the Vermilion Dragon.
The Red Phoenix spreads golden wings,
The Azure Luan dances in the great sky.
The spirit furnace refines the jade countenance,
The golden tripod casts the vermilion visage.
Within and without, radiant light congeals,
On the cinnabar terrace, snow melts to warm crimson.
Having realized truth, transcending creation,
Bright moon and clear wind.

---

**Chant of Opening Transformation**

Non-action, purity—inner cultivation complete,
First encountering Heaven’s Origin, the Dao is not hard.
Naturally attaining the formless, merging as one,
The numinous beings of the Dark Capital lock the hidden pass.
Flaming great qi rises and falls in emptiness,
Resplendent celestial light rolls upon the jade altar.
Silent, the ten thousand spirits plummet within the void,
Towering, the Primordial Treasure connects to Kunlun.
Gathering, the Jade Maiden enters the Mystic Valley,
Assembling, the Golden Infant arrays in auspicious ranks.
Everywhere blue lotuses bloom in the full sun,
In the empty void, the mystic signs return at last.
Soaring, the Five-Colored Round Light Terrace,
Dazzling, rosy clouds gather myriad transformations.
Gently, the divine wind lightly wafts,
Numinous, the golden form adorns itself.
Clear, the precious jade lingers in place,
Pure, the numinous cinnabar delights the bones.
Silently realizing truth—no words to speak,
Brightly the full Dao’s affairs are all erased.
Mysteriously guarding the true Three Treasures,
Wondrously the work is done—a single elixir pearl.
Vast, silver clouds ever shroud,
Radiant, the jade nature pursues itself.
Floating, sleeves dance beyond the Three Realms,
Merging, the morning audience reveals the inner visage.
Bright, at ease like the autumn night’s moon,
Brilliant, ever abiding in the Jade Empyrean.
Awake, clear—immortals’ joy,
Profound, limpid—the Dao-nature at leisure.
Through kalpas, the true visage escapes the sea of suffering,
From ancient to present, the perfect image emerges from waves.
The Great Net’s assembly—together we return,
Awakening to principle, perceiving truth—observe closely.

---

**Chant of Revealing the Dao**

Myriad hanging signs fill the empty sky,
Responding to the myriad transformations of humans and heavens.
The most wondrous immortals leave secret formulas,
Know that before father and mother were born—
Yin and Yang’s creation holds the full truth of reality,
Yet this single point of numinous light remains unknown.
Chaos transforms, transcending beyond things,
The inner spirit follows each step, treading the cloud ladder.
The Primal Round Awareness—the true empty body,
Nature and life contain light, heaven and earth align.
A hundred bones become numinous, the heart delights,
The passionless youth smiles faintly.
Washing the heart with the Dharma rain, clearly irrigating,
Opening the Dao’s radiance, emerging from the mire.
Transporting pearls and treasures, connecting above and below,
Drawing and adding water and fire, uniting east and west.
The Mystic Origin’s Four Greats open the heart’s seal,
Secret scriptures and numinous texts surpass worldly marvels.
Each line strikes the marrow’s illness,
Every word directly points to non-action.
Carefree, admonishing the principle of long life,
Darkly harmonizing with Heaven’s True, unmoving.
Transmitting the Dao’s grand affinity—Master Yuyang,
Rescuing peril, lifting suffering, delivering the foolish and lost.

---

**Chant of the True One**

True filial piety, true compassion, true weighing,
True heart, true encounter, gathering true coolness.
True master, true formula, penetrating true refinement,
True conduct, true merit—true Dao-ground.
True stillness, true purity—the great true Dao,
True mystery, true wonder—congealing true auspice.
True clarity, true awakening—true no-leakage,
True words, true speech—accord with the Highest Heaven.
True Tiger, true Dragon—true creation,
True mountains, true waters—nurturing harmonious light.
True leisure, true joy—true no-stain,
True sages, true worthies—filling the ten directions.
True nature, true visage—true ease,
True Chan, true Dao—revealing true constancy.
True heaven, true earth—spreading true virtue,
True sages, true immortals—everywhere fragrant.

---

**Chant of the Azure Youth**

Silent, desolate—one intoxication,
Rustling, scattering—joyful crimson countenance.
Clear, pure—completing the truth of reality,
Silent, vacuous—guarding the inner content.
Gently, endlessly swallowing purple auspice,
Limpid, discerning—drinking rosy wind.
Full, gathering—the light of heaven congeals,
Vast, profound—establishing the ancestral line.
Encounter after encounter—transcending the other shore,
Upright, precise—speaking of true emptiness.
Numinous, charming—immortals’ joy,
Joyful, delighted—passing years in abundance.

---

**Chant of Returning the Light**

Having leisure, I return,
Cultivating truth—unmoving.
Transforming karmic ties, leaving suffering and distress,
Worthy friends become companions in knowing.
Everywhere together we discuss and investigate,
Delivering humans and heavens from delusion.
The Six Dusts unblock old obstructions,
The Three Treasures wondrously and precisely upheld.
Beyond emptiness, the mystic light gathers,
Spiritual luminaries dare not deceive.
Clear wind pervades the Four Greats,
Bright moon orders the countenance.
White-haired, preserving past and present,
Golden body encompassing the four directions.

chunks.original_text: 儒童皆拱手，真相等头齐。 法本空无住，真功自不亏。 运朝天地静，乌兔任东西。 变化真灵性，朝元自有期。 诸天来稽首，三界悉归依。 悟者投真趣，修仙绝妙机。 无生出混沌，道俗显尊卑。 玄真吟　敕修新道院住持作 宣住真仙院，情乾绝外非。 恩童赐一小童侍奉作伴供两饭，灵物饮刀圭。 四大俱调摄，三光不暂离。 六尘无染着，八脉自通微。 一句金丹诀，都超万化机。 七明通一聚，九转不难知。 十地圆明结，真空话祖基。 大通观自在，一点镇无为。 放旷天衣禄，逍遥绝世羁。 化生真水火，日月两交飞。 悟彻先天理，升腾自有期。 冲融明了了，道德实希夷。 授教吟 师游东海道方行，从此玄门日日兴。 至教人天扶圣化，法言空外契黄庭。 壶中密炼全今古，斡运游玑宇宙清。 气化本源无漏体，神真一点碧霞精。 冲开玉藏通三宾，放出圆光射五明。 洞达虚空方自在，回还养拙渐神灵。 慧风飘荡千痾散，真一冲和万化生。 宝璧流辉投玉海，真祥变炼结朱婴。 纯阳加减天光绽，水火浮沉道进程。 灌顶醍醐人怎晓，出尘手段世皆惊。 山呜谷吼连天喜，揭地轰雷发笑声。 得道无为真了了，周而复始自圆成。 搜真吟 浩然无极真空体，落在迷囚不辨真。 酒色气财摧本柄，忧愁思虑丧元真。 悟来掣碎眉间锁，省后修完性内真。 玉洞云封堪养浩，丹台雪暖渐全真。 千重宝焰攒神室，万道天光罩本真。 皓月清风同一体，无为无漏自朝真。 脱尘吟 大道留传小小真，下方云海遇良因。 仲尼蕴行同成侣，白首金容可作邻。 三界十方归一化，千门万法妙通神。 盖因缄口清心地，运转精光日日新。 万万灵明常守护，千千鸾鹤自相亲。 诸天诸地皆通彻，未肯轻传与世人。 元命吟 真一善人，唯德是辅。 广演慈悲，拔亡济苦。 养浩通灵，真祥反哺。 积庆无涯，福星临注。 俗契恩深，投胎父母。 化成身体，补修根祖。 苦行实心，包怀今古。 接众指迷，百灵加护。 内炼真空，普施甘露。 混世光阴，莹然而住。 万变定基，俱无作做。 地狱天堂，从人所慕。 解脱羁缰，誓无回顾。 日月流光，每遭真遇。 养火投玄，祥光敷布。 透入晴空，展开云路。 法界周旋，万神攒聚。 跳出轮回，满空歌舞。 洞焕太空，我之门户。 玉簿书名，一闻千悟。 上达诸天，下开冥府。 法道通真，皇天后土。 金液还丹，洗心坚固。 拟学神仙，莫存能所。 自遇真师，专凭养素。 皓月知音，清风伴侣。 朗照无边，欣逢正主。 四大五常，回光返补。 了了无为，尽朝元去。 云光集卷之三竟 #1此诗原本窜乱，难以卒读。 以上参考《洞玄金玉集》卷六所载马钰同名歌诗，整理校读成篇。 云光集卷之四 圣水玉阳王处一撰
chunks.translated_text:
**The Young Scholars All Bow with Hands Clasped,**
True appearances stand equal in rank.
The Dharma fundamentally abides in empty non-abiding,
True merit never diminishes.

Heaven and earth in the reigning dynasty grow still,
Sun and moon drift east and west at will.
Transformations reveal the true numinous nature,
The audience at the Origin has its appointed time.

All heavens come to bow in reverence,
The Three Realms wholly submit in refuge.
Those who awaken turn toward the true essence,
Cultivating immortality—exquisite and subtle mechanism.

From non-being emerges from primordial chaos,
Dao and the vulgar reveal the noble and base.

---

**Chant of the Mystic Truth**
*Composed upon imperial decree for the abbot of the newly established Daoist cloister*

Proclaimed to reside in the Cloister of True Immortals,
Emotions and heaven cut off external wrongs.
A young attendant, graced by imperial favor, serves as companion,
Offering two meals, sacred objects, and the elixir’s measure.

The Four Greats are all regulated,
The Three Luminaries never depart for even a moment.
The Six Dusts remain unstained,
The Eight Vessels naturally open and subtly flow.

A single phrase of the Golden Elixir’s secret
Transcends the mechanisms of the myriad transformations.
Seven lights converge in one gathering,
Nine revolutions are not difficult to know.

The Ten Grounds perfect and illumine, forming completion,
True emptiness—speaking of the ancestral foundation.
Great penetration observes self-mastery,
A single point stabilizes non-action.

Unfettered, celestial robes and emoluments,
Carefree—untethered from worldly bonds.
Transforming and generating true water and fire,
Sun and moon intertwine in flight.

Comprehending the principles of prior heaven,
Ascension has its appointed time.
Merging and clarifying—lucid and bright,
Virtue and power truly rare and recondite.

---

**Chant of Transmitting the Teaching**

The master wanders the eastern sea routes,
From this day forth, the Mystic Gate flourishes daily.
The supreme teaching upholds the sagely transformation of humans and heavens,
Dharma words beyond emptiness resonate with the *Yellow Court*.

Within the gourd, secret refinement completes past and present,
Revolving the pivot—cosmos cleansed.
Qi-transformations arise from the root of the leakless body,
A single point of divine truth—azure radiance’s essence.

Breaking open the jade treasury, connecting the Three Guests,
Releasing the perfect light to shine upon the Five Illuminations.
Thoroughly penetrating emptiness—only then is there self-mastery,
Returning to nurture simplicity—gradually the spirit becomes numinous.

Wisdom’s wind scatters a thousand afflictions,
True unity and harmony give rise to the myriad transformations.
Jeweled brilliance flows into the jade sea,
True auspices transform and refine—forming the cinnabar infant.

Yang’s addition and subtraction—heavenly light unfolds,
Water and fire’s floating and sinking—Dao’s progression.
Anointing the crown with ghee—who can fathom?
Exiting the dust’s methods—astonishing the world.

Mountains roar, valleys howl—joining heaven’s joy,
Lifting the earth—thunderous laughter erupts.
Attaining the Dao, non-action—truly lucid,
Circling and returning—naturally perfected.

---

**Chant of Seeking the Truth**

Vast and boundless—the true empty body,
Falling into deluded imprisonment—unable to discern truth.
Wine, sex, anger, and wealth erode the root handle,
Worry, sorrow, thought, and anxiety deplete the original truth.

Awakening shatters the lock between the brows,
After reflection, cultivation completes the inner truth.
Jade caves sealed in clouds—fit for nurturing vastness,
Snow-warmed cinnabar terraces—gradually perfecting truth.

A thousand layers of jeweled flames gather in the spirit chamber,
Ten thousand pathways of heavenly light envelop the original truth.
Bright moon and clear wind—one body,
Non-action and non-leakage—naturally attending the truth.

---

**Chant of Shedding the Dust**

The Great Dao transmits a small truth,
In the lower realm’s cloudy seas—encountering good causes.
Confucius’ accumulated conduct forms companions,
White-haired golden countenance—fit to be neighbors.

The Three Realms and ten directions return to one transformation,
A thousand gates and myriad methods—wondrously penetrating the divine.
Because of sealing the mouth and purifying the mind-ground,
Revolving the essence-light—daily renewed.

Myriad upon myriad numinous luminosities constantly guard,
Thousands upon thousands of phoenixes and cranes naturally draw near.
All heavens and all earths—thoroughly penetrated,
Yet unwilling to lightly transmit to worldly people.

---

**Chant of the Original Mandate**

True unity—good person,
Only virtue is the support.
Broadly extending compassion,
Rescuing the deceased, relieving suffering.

Nurturing vastness, penetrating the numinous,
True auspices return in repayment.
Accumulating blessings without limit,
Fortune stars descend in bestowal.

Common bonds—profound kindness,
Invested in the womb of parents.
Transforming into a physical body,
Repairing and cultivating ancestral roots.

Austere practice—sincere heart,
Embracing past and present.
Guiding the lost, pointing out delusion,
A hundred spirits add protection.

Internally refining true emptiness,
Universally bestowing sweet dew.
Mingling with the world’s fleeting years,
Luminously abiding.

Myriad changes establish the foundation,
All without contrivance.
Hell and heaven,
Follow human aspiration.

Liberated from bonds and fetters,
Vowing never to look back.
Sun and moon’s flowing light,
Each encounter—true meeting.

Nurturing fire, investing in the mysterious,
Auspicious light spreads forth.
Piercing into the clear sky,
Unfolding the cloud path.

The Dharma realm revolves,
Myriad spirits gather.
Leaping out of the wheel of rebirth,
Filling the void with song and dance.

Resplendent—primordial emptiness,
My gate and door.
Jade register records the name,
A single hearing—thousandfold awakening.

Ascending to reach all heavens,
Descending to open the nether realms.
Dharma and Dao connect to truth,
Heaven above and earth below.

Golden liquid returning elixir,
Washing the heart—firm and steadfast.
Aspiring to learn immortality,
Do not harbor subject or object.

Naturally encountering a true master,
Rely solely on nurturing simplicity.
Bright moon—knowing confidant,
Clear wind—companion.

Radiantly illuminating without bound,
Joyfully encountering the true lord.
Four Greats and Five Constants,
Returning the light—repairing and supplementing.

Lucid and non-active,
All attend the Origin.
*Cloud Radiance Collection, Scroll Three—Concluded*

*Cloud Radiance Collection, Scroll Four*
*Composed by Wang Chuyi of Yuyang, the Jade Sun*

chunks.original_text: ［词］ 沁园春 予自七岁，遇东华帝君於空中警唤，不令昏昧。 至大定戊子，复遇重阳师父，因作此词，用纪其实云。 元禀仙胎，隐七岁玄光混太阳。 感东华真迹，飘空垂顾，悟人间世梦，复遇重阳。 密叩玄关，潜施高论，皓月清风炼一阳。 神丹结，继璇玑斡运，羽化清阳。 欣欣舞拜纯阳，又虚妙天师同正阳。 命海蟾引进旌阳。 元妙古任安，尹喜关令丹阳。 大道横施，驱云天下，绝荡冤魔显玉阳。 诸仙会，讲无生天理，空外真阳。 满庭芳二十一首 住铁查山云光洞作 俯视沧溟，屏山掩映，万重松桧森然。 金波滚滚，云锁翠峰巅。 昼对清光浩渺，更阑显、月印新鲜。 圆明聚，红霞影裹，捧出洞中仙。 元初真面目，如今了了，高卧云轩。 为丹炉无漏，颐养三千。 圣祖垂光下降，诸天举、婴子朝元。 功成也，金书紫诏，常在玉皇前。 中夼于大郎索 一点灵光，无中显现，太平高步烟霞。 清风皓月，流注玉京砂。 五气三元结秀，升腾处、云辂交加。 蓬瀛会，瑞光缥渺，盈座散香花。 堪夸。 真妙用，仙丹一粒，洞焕东华。 满太虚寥廓，清境无涯。 认得元初至性，因修炼、清净根芽。 圆成也，玉蟾影裹，稳赴大罗家。 上京刘朝真索 四大容仪，三田灵秀，炼成九转丹砂。 虚无自在，以道作生涯。 净土祥光瑞彩，玲珑贯、天外烟霞。 冲和处，乌飞兔走，同运紫河车。 真仙开妙趣，菩提佛果，一理无差。 指玉清境界，此际何赊。 伫听金书紫诏，人间事、元没交加。 当归去，庆霄高会，风景向谁夸。 赠卢宣武二首 日裹金鸡，月中玉兔，变通玄象盈亏。 无形斡运，三界现慈悲。 长养诸天大地，资三教、天下归依。 真明了，观天之道，清净更无为。 十方诸道众，回头猛悟，拂袖云归。 养神胎灵骨，锻灭阴尸。 定是回颜易质，通玄奥、物外精持。 丹圆满，根源了了，皆作度人师。 又 心爇真香，神排妙供，满空逼送丹方。 收藏灵宝，嘉瑞自呈祥。 一点穿联浩劫，两仪内、反复阴阳。 全真乐，团团性月，光散满空香。 搜详玄妙理，根源无漏，道德芬芳。 聚神砂玉液，无致倾亡。 结果真仙妙道，超三界、无极清凉。 全家悟，颐神养浩，皆得到蓬庄。 赠莱阳县宰刘显武 今古相传，昌阳胜地，好修六度三坛。 休心绝虑，颐养紫金丹。 玉洞收归万化，昆冈上，风月珊珊。 云光聚，三田结秀，返老变童颜。 玄关牢锁闭，金婴玉姹，仙诏追攀。 挂六天如意，复采芝兰。 杳杳长天高举，飘飘聚、罗列仙班。 君知否，缘深行广，达道本非难。 〔丹宠山〕 因福山县王远村北丹灶山，道友聚话，论及此山乃方平修炼之处，话间空中忽有报应，遂作。 丹灶为冈，清洋蟠绕，昔居王远家庄。 八山耸翠，四水聚贤良。 五彩祥云覆罩，三天上、仙韵琅琅。 金童报，九霄传送，无外我容光。 空生初请问，真如善应，大法空王。 演苦空般若，左右圆方。 立教分乘引度，通十地、诸圣行藏。 虚空裹，希夷大道，浩劫永无疆。 赠出家众 米麦精华，冲和恬惔，自然造化成神。 无生妙道，迤逦变良因。 既得长生久视，明颠倒、月伴风邻。 先师教，颐真了性，富国更安民。 清新。 腾朗耀，天威扫荡，馘灭祆氛。 布大慈甘露，广被人伦。 却返生前混沌，重加遇、枯朽逢春。
chunks.translated_text:
**[Lyrics] "Spring in Qin Garden"**

From seven years of age, I encountered the Lord of Eastern Florescence in the void, who awakened me from dullness. In the *wuchen* year of the Dading era, I again met Master Chongyang, and so composed this lyric to record the truth:

Innately endowed with the immortal embryo,
At seven, my hidden radiance merged with the great yang.
Moved by the true traces of Eastern Florescence,
Drifting through the void to bestow his regard,
I awoke to the dream of the human world—
Then once more met Chongyang.
Secretly I knocked at the Mysterious Pass,
As he subtly expounded profound discourse,
Refining the single yang with bright moon and clear wind.
The divine elixir congealed,
Continuing the pivot of the celestial sphere,
Ascending in transformation to the pure yang.

Joyfully I danced and bowed to Pure Yang,
With the wondrously empty Heavenly Master and True Yang.
Commanded by Sea Toad to guide and advance Star Yang,
With Yuanmiao, the ancient Ren An,
And Yin Xi, the Pass Keeper of Danyang.
The Great Dao spread horizontally,
Driving clouds across the world,
Utterly sweeping away karmic demons to reveal Jade Sun.
All immortals gathered,
Expounding the heavenly principle of non-birth,
The true yang beyond the void.

---

**Twenty-One "Court-Filling Fragrance" Lyrics**
*Composed at Cloud Radiance Grotto on Iron Fork Mountain*

Bending to gaze at the azure sea,
Screening mountains layer upon layer,
Myriad pines and cypresses stand solemn.
Golden waves surge,
Clouds shroud the emerald peaks.
By day, I face the vast and limpid light;
At night’s end, the moon’s fresh imprint appears.
In perfect clarity it gathers,
Crimson radiance enfolding,
The immortal emerging from the grotto.

The original true countenance,
Now utterly realized,
I recline high in the cloud pavilion.
For the elixir furnace is without leakage,
Nurturing the three thousand.
The sagely ancestor bestows descending radiance,
All heavens lift the infant to attend the Origin.
When merit is complete,
Golden script and purple edicts
Will ever stand before the Jade Emperor.

---

*For Elder Brother Da Lang*

A single spark of numinous light,
Manifesting from the void,
Treading the heights of peace amidst mist and rosy clouds.
Clear wind and bright moon
Flow into the cinnabar of Jade Capital.
The five qi and three primals knit their excellence,
Ascending where cloud chariots intertwine.
At the Penglai assembly,
Auspicious light drifts ethereally,
Filling the seats with scattered incense and flowers.

How splendid!
The true wondrous work:
A single grain of immortal elixir,
Brilliantly illuminating Eastern Florescence.
Filling the vast emptiness,
The pure realm knows no bounds.
Recognizing the original, primal nature,
Through cultivation,
The pure and tranquil root-sprout.
When perfection is achieved,
Within the moon’s shadow,
Steadily ascend to the Great Luo’s abode.

---

*For Liu Chaozhen of the Capital*

The four greats’ demeanor,
The three fields’ numinous excellence,
Refined into ninefold-transmuted cinnabar.
Empty and free,
I make the Dao my livelihood.
The Pure Land’s auspicious light and propitious hues,
Exquisite and penetrating,
Mist and rosy clouds beyond the heavens.
In harmony,
Sun flies and moon runs,
Together moving the purple river chariot.

True immortals open wondrous realms,
Bodhi and Buddha-fruit,
A single principle without distinction.
Pointing to the Jade Clarity’s realm,
How distant is this moment?
Awaiting the golden script and purple edicts,
Worldly affairs
Originally held no entanglements.
When the time comes to return,
Celebrating the celestial assembly on high,
To whom shall I boast of the scenery?

---

**Two Lyrics for Lu Xuanwu**

Within the sun, the golden rooster;
Within the moon, the jade hare,
Transforming and circulating the celestial signs’ wax and wane.
Formless, it revolves,
The three realms manifesting compassion.
Nurturing all heavens and earth,
Supporting the three teachings,
The world returns to reliance.
Truly enlightened,
Observing heaven’s Dao,
Pure and non-active.

All Daoists of the ten directions,
Turning their heads in sudden awakening,
Sweep their sleeves and return to the clouds.
Nurturing the immortal embryo’s numinous bones,
Forging and extinguishing the yin corpse.
Certainly, the countenance is renewed and the form transformed,
Penetrating the profound mysteries,
Maintaining essence beyond the material.
When the elixir is complete,
The root-source utterly realized,
All become masters who ferry others.

---

Again:

The heart burns true incense,
The spirit arrays wondrous offerings,
Filling the void to transmit the elixir formula.
Gathering and treasuring the numinous treasures,
Auspicious omens naturally appear.
A single point pierces through kalpas,
Within the two modes,
Yin and yang reverse and return.
The joy of the perfected truth,
The full moon of nature,
Its light scattering fragrant radiance throughout the void.

Searching and examining the profound mysteries,
The root-source without leakage,
Moral power fragrant.
Gathering the spirit-sand and jade liquid,
No risk of collapse or loss.
The fruition of the true immortal’s wondrous Dao,
Transcending the three realms,
Utterly cool and boundless.
The whole family awakens,
Nurturing the spirit and fostering vastness,
All attain the Penglai estate.

---

*For Prefect Liu Xianwu of Laiyang County*

Transmitted through the ages,
Changyang’s sacred land,
Well-suited for cultivating the six perfections and three altars.
Still the heart and sever thoughts,
Nurturing the purple-gold elixir.
The Jade Grotto gathers and returns the myriad transformations,
Upon Kunlun’s ridge,
Wind and moon glisten.
Cloud radiance gathers,
The three fields knit their excellence,
Reversing age to change the youthful countenance.

The Mysterious Pass firmly sealed,
Golden infant and jade maiden,
Immortal edicts pursue and ascend.
Hanging the six heavens’ *ruyi*,
Again gathering orchids.
Vast and distant, soaring high in the long sky,
Drifting and gathering,
Immortals arrayed in ranks.
Do you know?
With deep karmic affinity and broad practice,
Attaining the Dao is fundamentally not difficult.

---

**[Cinnabar Hill]**

At Cinnabar Furnace Hill north of Wangyuan Village in Fushan County, Daoist friends gathered to converse. Discussing how this hill was once Master Fangping’s place of cultivation, suddenly from the void came a response, and so I composed this:

Cinnabar Furnace forms the ridge,
Clear waters coil and wind,
Once the estate of Wang Yuan’s family.
Eight mountains rise in emerald,
Four waters gather the worthy.
Five-colored auspicious clouds cover,
From the three heavens,
Immortal melodies ring clear.
The golden youth reports,
From the nine skies transmitting,
My radiance embraces all without exception.

From the void’s beginning, the question arises:
True suchness responds with goodness,
The great Dharma’s empty king.
Expounding suffering, emptiness, and prajñā,
Left and right, round and square.
Establishing teachings, dividing vehicles to guide and ferry,
Penetrating the ten stages,
All sages’ practices and retreats.
Within the void,
The great Dao of non-being and non-non-being,
Through kalpas, eternally boundless.

---

*For Those Who Have Left the Household*

The essence of rice and wheat,
Harmonious and tranquil,
Naturally completing the spirit through transformation.
The wondrous Dao of non-birth,
Gradually transforming good causes.
Having attained longevity and enduring vision,
Illuminating inversions,
Moon as companion, wind as neighbor.
The former master’s teachings:
Nurturing the true and realizing nature,
Enriching the nation and pacifying the people.

Pure and fresh,
Soaring and radiant,
Heavenly might sweeps away,
Beheading and extinguishing demonic vapors.
Spreading great compassion’s sweet dew,
Widely covering humanity.
Returning to the former chaos before birth,
Again encountering
Withered and decayed meeting spring.

*Cloud Radiance Collection, Scroll Three—Concluded*

*Composed by Wang Chuyi of Yuyang, the Jade Sun*

chunks.original_text: 方知道，三田宝满，一性免沉沦。 〔奉敕作〕 三宣到都，住持天长观，复敕修新道院，乃作。 诏赴天长，敕修堂宇，道弘一布归真。 我师玄化，谭马并加恩。 七朵金莲显异，清朝喜、优渥惟新。 重宣至，车乘驷马，祝谢圣明君。 皆成。 诸法会，亲王宰职，裹外忠臣。 遇太平真乐，道德洪因。 更望参玄众友，遵三教、千古同欣。 齐回向，吾皇万寿，永永御枫宸。 赞丹阳公 久宦东牟，清门高广，自然别有行藏。 吕真遗训，一指遇重阳。 拂袖西秦顺化，真功就、复返吾乡。 朝元去，回颜换质，处处显嘉祥。 昌阳。 留异迹，普天设教，劝爇心香。 得灵源开悟，独处清凉。 宝鼎丹成九转，明颠倒、返照回光。 同成道，称扬盛德，呈上满庭芳。 〔祈雨〕 黄县久旱，请作黄箓醮，得饱雨，作二首。 暂别东牟，西游登郡，万灵遥列金乡。 无穷仙眷，空外总呈祥。 休道蓬莱路远，诸直圣、都会芝阳。 星坛下，凉天静夜，云宴礼虚皇。 十方同法会，丹诚对圣，出罪行香。 度九幽离苦，悉睹三光。 见在俱蒙福佑，沾甘露、同免灾殃。 逍遥乐，圆坛罢散，齐唱满庭芳。 又 龙转西江，金光摇曳，踊身飞上穹苍。 兴云吐雾，威力大施张。 槁稼俄逢饱雨，人心尽、欣喜洋洋。 将何喻，如收瑞宝，恰似到仙乡。 真阳。 胜朗耀，虚无象外，剔现容光。 住混元三界，永劫无央。 深荷三清降福，为东南、云海行香。 休言破，太平随喜，以道证真常。 赠范明叔 寸步西流，冲开牛斗，清风皓月容光。 满空圣众，把我好相将。 俯赐鸾骖凤驾，献金鼎、丹药馨香。 天河转，星坛月殿，端的景非常。 老来云汉去，皮囊脱下，一别吾乡。 返玉京金阙，仙路悠扬。 稳挂天衣可体，灵风散、环佩玎珰。 朝元会，十方三界，齐唱满庭芳。 示门人令往文登设贫 彭李刘哥，三人一志，能和满县知交。 宁心效力，相助各坚牢。 今日文山去也，设贫会、无论卑高。 严冬苦，迎风冒雪，认取莫辞劳。 搬柴并运水，依时救济，粒米休抛。 禀合堂高意，宠辱含包。 灭火须凭法忍，除阴鬼、全仗禅刀。 真阳动，烹金炼玉，永永列仙曹。 赣榆县诸王庙黄箓醮罢赠众 海郡行缘，赣榆阐化，良因复显诸王。 谨修黄箓，特地召嘉祥。 万里云收雾卷，微风息、灯烛荧煌。 星坛上，步虚声举，月下正悠扬。 频频施拜跪，虔诚仰彻，列圣闻香。 降无边恩惠，普救存亡。 从此皆成快乐，离阴府、升上天堂。 开云宴，保生接寿，齐唱满庭芳。 抄化孤魂经纸 杳杳穷魂，冥冥长夜，沉沉莫辨年龄。 全无知识，何处问亲情。 一自飘零浩散，空愁苦、宁得超升。 同垂救，巡门拜覆，乞纸复抄经。 明公宜省察，慈悲愿广，福利咸增。 感三天诸圣，悉副微诚。 火翳翻为莲沼，恩光射、枯骨回灵。 皆遭遇，永除愆过，悉得悟圆明。 述怀 苦海奔波，刻山劳役，欲求宝璧嘉祥。 周而复始，瞥地悟真常。 两凑玄关运度，升灵曜、飞出扶桑。 回光看，璇玑万象，一一现明堂。 人还穷此理，尘缘悉屏，世梦都忘。 觉身心和畅，无限清凉。 万化收归鼎内，红光进、丹熟馨香。 吞服了，还童返老，出自满庭芳。 丹阳升霞作黄箓醮罢忆师遂作 的祖纯阳，随时显异，密传师父仙宗。 重阳悯化，遗教马扶风。 斡运玄机顺应，真功就、三界圆融。
chunks.translated_text:
When one truly knows the Dao,
The Three Fields brim with treasures,
And the singular nature avoids sinking into perdition.

*By Imperial Edict Composed*

Thrice summoned to the capital,
Residing at Tianchang Abbey,
Again by edict to rebuild the new Daoist cloister—
Decreed to attend Tianchang,
Ordered to restore its halls and chambers,
The Dao spreads wide, all returning to truth.

Our master’s profound transformation,
Tan and Ma both receive grace.
Seven golden lotuses manifest wonders,
The court rejoices, favor renewed.
Once more the imperial summons arrives,
Chariots drawn by four horses,
Offering thanks to the sagely and enlightened sovereign.

All is accomplished.

In every Dharma assembly,
Princes, ministers, and officials,
Loyal subjects within and beyond the court.
Encountering the true joy of Great Peace,
The vast causes of virtue and Dao.
Further hoping that fellow seekers of the mystery
Will uphold the Three Teachings,
Rejoicing together through the ages.
Together we dedicate,
Wishing our emperor ten thousand years,
Eternally enthroned in the vermilion palace.

*In Praise of Lord Danyang*

Long serving in Dongmou,
Of noble and illustrious lineage,
Naturally possessing a distinct destiny.
Receiving Lü’s true legacy,
A single gesture meeting Chongyang.
Sweeping his sleeves, he followed the transformations in western Qin,
Perfecting true attainment,
Returning to his homeland.
Advancing toward the origin,
His countenance renewed, his form transformed,
Everywhere manifesting auspicious signs.

In Changyang,
Leaving wondrous traces,
Teaching spread across the heavens,
Exhorting the burning of heart-incense.
Attaining the awakening of the numinous source,
Abiding alone in cool clarity.
The precious cauldron completes nine revolutions of the elixir,
Illuminating inversions,
Reflecting and returning the light.
Together attaining the Dao,
Extolling his abundant virtue,
Presenting *Man Ting Fang*.

*Seeking Rain*

For the long drought in Huang County,
A Yellow Register Retreat was held,
And abundant rain fell—
Two poems composed.

Briefly parting from Dongmou,
Journeying west to Deng Prefecture,
Countless spirits arrayed afar in Jinxiang.
Boundless immortal retinues,
All manifesting auspices beyond the void.
Do not say Penglai’s path is distant—
All the perfected,
Gather in Zhiyang.
Beneath the stars,
In the cool, still night,
Clouds feast in homage to the August Sovereign of the Void.

The ten directions join the Dharma assembly,
Sincere devotion before the sages,
Presenting incense to absolve transgressions.
Delivering the nine dark realms from suffering,
All behold the Three Lights.
Those present all receive blessings and protection,
Bathed in sweet dew,
Together spared from calamity.
In carefree joy,
The circular altar disperses,
All singing *Man Ting Fang*.

Again—
Dragons turn in the western river,
Golden light swaying and shimmering,
Leaping bodies soaring into the vault of heaven.
Summoning clouds, spouting mist,
Mighty power fully displayed.
Withered crops suddenly meet abundant rain,
All hearts overflow with joy.
What can compare?
As if gathering auspicious treasures,
Just like arriving in the immortal realm.

True yang,
Resplendent and radiant,
Beyond the formless,
Emerging with luminous countenance.
Abiding in the primordial chaos of the Three Realms,
For kalpas without end.
Deeply indebted to the Three Pure Ones for descending blessings,
For the southeast,
Fragrant incense wafts across the cloudy seas.
Say not it is broken—
Great Peace follows in joy,
Through the Dao attesting to the eternal constant.

*For Fan Mingshu*

A single step flowing west,
Piercing through the Ox and Dipper,
In the clear wind and bright moon, his countenance shines.
The sky filled with sages,
Guiding me well.
Bestowing phoenix carriages and simurgh chariots,
Offering golden tripods,
Fragrant elixirs and incense.
The Milky Way turns,
Star altars and moon palaces,
Truly a scene beyond compare.

In old age, ascending to the cloudy Han,
Shedding the skin-bag,
Parting from his homeland.
Returning to the jade capital and golden towers,
The immortal path stretches far.
Securely donning celestial robes,
A numinous breeze scatters,
Jade pendants chiming.
At the assembly of the origin,
The ten directions and Three Realms,
All sing *Man Ting Fang*.

*Instructions to Disciples Sent to Wendeng to Hold a Almsgiving*

Brothers Peng, Li, and Liu,
Three of one mind,
In harmony with all the county’s acquaintances.
Calm your hearts, devote your efforts,
Assisting one another, each steadfast.
Today, off to Wenshan,
Holding an almsgiving,
Regardless of high or low.
In the bitter cold of winter,
Facing the wind and braving the snow,
Recognize this—do not shirk the labor.

Carrying firewood and hauling water,
Aiding in due time,
Not a grain of rice to be wasted.
Upholding the high intent of the hall,
Embracing both honor and disgrace.
Extinguishing fire requires the patience of Dharma,
Dispelling yin ghosts,
Relies entirely on the sword of Chan.
True yang stirs,
Refining gold and jade,
Forever joining the ranks of immortals.

*After the Yellow Register Retreat at the Temple of Various Kings in Ganyu County, Presented to the Assembly*

In the coastal prefecture, spreading karmic conditions,
Ganyu expounding the transformations,
Favorable causes again manifesting to the various kings.
Diligently performing the Yellow Register Retreat,
Specially summoning auspicious signs.
For ten thousand miles, clouds gather and mists disperse,
Gentle winds cease,
Lamps and candles glow brightly.
Atop the star altar,
Steps of the void resound,
Beneath the moon, truly melodious.

Again and again bowing and kneeling,
Devout reverence piercing through,
The assembled sages hear the incense.
Descending boundless grace,
Universally saving the living and the dead.
From this, all attain bliss,
Leaving the shadowy realms,
Ascending to heaven.
Opening the cloud feast,
Preserving life and extending longevity,
All sing *Man Ting Fang*.

*Requesting Paper for Transcribing Sutras for Lonely Spirits*

Faint and distant, forsaken souls,
In the dark, endless night,
Deeply sunk, unable to discern the years.
Utterly without knowledge,
Where to inquire of kin?
Ever since drifting and scattering in the vast expanse,
Empty sorrow and suffering,
How may they ascend?
Together we extend salvation,
Going door to door, bowing and entreating,
Begging for paper to transcribe sutras again.

Noble lords, may you reflect,
Vast in compassion and vows,
Increasing blessings and benefits for all.
Moved by the myriad sages of the Three Heavens,
All responding to this humble sincerity.
The fiery haze transforms into lotus ponds,
Graceful light shines,
Dry bones revive.
All encounter deliverance,
Eternally freed from transgressions,
All awakening to perfect clarity.

*Expressing My Feelings*

Tossed in the bitter sea,
Toiling at Ke Mountain,
Seeking auspicious jade and treasures.
Circling again and again,
Suddenly awakening to the eternal constant.
The two converge at the mysterious pass, conveying passage,
Ascending the numinous radiance,
Soaring beyond Fusang.
Returning the light,
The celestial pivot and myriad images,
Each appearing in the Hall of Light.

When one thoroughly fathoms this principle,
Worldly dust is all cast aside,
The dream of the world entirely forgotten.
Awakening, body and mind harmonious and at ease,
Boundless cool clarity.
The myriad transformations gathered within the cauldron,
Crimson light advances,
The elixir ripens, fragrant.
Having swallowed it,
Rejuvenating the old, returning to youth,
All from *Man Ting Fang*.

*After the Yellow Register Retreat, Ascending the Rosy Clouds, Recalling My Master*

Of the lineage of Pure Yang,
Manifesting wonders in due time,
Secretly transmitting the immortal lineage to my master.
Chongyang, in his compassionate transformation,
Left teachings to Ma of Fufeng.
Revolving the mysterious mechanism, following its course,
Perfecting true attainment,
The Three Realms harmoniously merged.

chunks.original_text: 垂光降，亡灵济度，都在碧霄中。 诸公还悟解，顿抛俗海，体道皆同。 聚玄珠丹宝，返老还童。 定是超凡入圣，腾云外、光满山东。 真无妄，汞成九转，直赴大罗宫。 赠出家 厌贵辞荣，甘贫慕道，谦和柔弱行藏。 通真内炼，随步变清凉。 一点灵空顿晓，明显现、千古嘉祥。 因缘济，玉阳自此，同保见重阳。 心香。 通内外，氤氲遍彻，三界十方。 感大罗仙众，俯降恩光。 总救九玄七祖，离幽夜、高赴仙乡。 天元会，万神庆悦，齐唱满庭芳。 赠广陵镇散人 圣诀仙方，玄机妙理，无文口口相传。 幸蒙师诲，说破未生前。 默把周天斡运，见参罗、万象推迁。 成造化，真龙真虎，真汞与真铅。 黄庭交会处，五行颠倒，八卦穿连。 仗玉炉金鼎，巨火烹煎。 九转功夫数足，丹成也、阴尽阳全。 长生道，非遥非近，非缺亦非圆。 满庭芳攒三字 □□三光，□□从道，□□神守清凉。 □□悟正，遥唱满庭芳。 □□上朝归去，□□性、□□光泛纯阳。 □□觑，□□闻者，同我证真常。 □□我开化，□□信顺，福寿延长。 □□仁丹结，四大圆方。 □□明中叫笑，□□出、通阐嘉祥。 □□语，□□道德，随步飘扬。 神光灿（声声慢） 石中隐玉，蚌内藏珠，须凭匠手功夫。 裹面真光显现，恰似元初。 欲要明心识性，把般般、打破空虚。 清净处，见天如玉案，秋夜蟾孤。 自是十方明彻，握阴阳枢要，尘垢难拘。 古往达人因此，妙入无余。 谕甚千枝万叶，与儒门、释道同居。 常归一，证圆成了了，得赴仙都。 满路花四首 普天诸道众，的可认真修。 九关无漏果，万神留。 金铅玉汞，水火自添抽。 三田云浪滚，般载金丹，玉人稳驾神舟。 乾坤净、日月交流。 功行悉圆周。 一灵真性在，任遨游。 满空仙眷，接引按云头。 浩然超法界，应化人间，大罗玉簿名收。 赠三州五会善众 文山崇七宝，宁海涌金莲。 三光同照耀，玉华天。 能持平等，结果好因缘。 五方清雅致，和气盈盈，化成瑞霭祥烟。 吐仙花、四季新鲜。 光焰射云轩。 收藏天地髓，上朝元。 金婴玉姹，不语内传言。 万神皆伫听，都会龙祥，大金东土神仙。 寄朝元公 深蒙频见召，惊悚可奔驰。 三州缘未尽，不能离。 诸方主醮，叨忝度群迷。 忽承佳翰至，不久亲来，再同一话玄微。 善称扬、大道根基。 开发众心疑。 前程关要处，谨精持。 玄珠收得，时复饮刀圭。 宝华圆满后，透过晴空，玉京别有嘉期。 赠文山周先生 仙花常烂熳，不减四时荣。 因凭真水火，锻金精。 功圆丹结，步步彩云轻。 满头风月爽，一粒刀圭，太虚仙路亲行。 任消除、万劫尘情。 别有好前程。 这迥无老死，得长生。 仙风道骨，自觉太孤清。 万派银河转，拨弄天关，大罗真性圆明。 木兰花幔 赣榆县诸王村三殿庙黄箓醮罢作 恣逍遥豁畅，乃容膝小金山。 用妙力加持，兴洪大醮，真圣临坛。 恩光徧施下界，救存亡、离苦列仙班。 明贯从容法体，宴居一味萧闲。 回还诱演幽深，将内外事都删。 聚五菔清凉，天宁地静，撞透三关。 皇天助弘大道，度群生、万类不为难。 指日金书语下，永辞俗海尘寰。 一枝花 药方 普劝门中友，妙药时人有。 先师亲说下，与君修。 一味真心，击缚休教走。 柔弱为引子，低下服之，论甚食前食后。
chunks.translated_text:
Radiant light descends,
The departed souls are delivered,
All within the azure heavens.
If you, sirs, awaken to this truth,
Suddenly cast aside the sea of mundane dust,
Embodying the Dao as one.
Gather the mysterious pearl, the elixir treasure,
Returning old to youth.
Surely this is transcending the mortal to enter sagehood,
Soaring beyond the clouds,
Light filling Shandong.
Truly without falsehood,
Mercury refined through nine cycles,
Straight to the Palace of Great Purity.

*Presented to a Renunciant*
Weary of nobility, forsaking glory,
Embracing poverty, yearning for the Dao,
Humble and gentle in conduct.
Through inner refinement, attaining communion with the true,
Each step transforms into cool clarity.
A single spark of numinous emptiness brings sudden enlightenment,
Manifesting clearly,
Auspicious omens of a thousand ages.
By this karmic connection,
Yuyang from this point,
Together shall behold Chongyang.

*Heart Incense*
Permeating inner and outer,
Pervading all with fragrant mist,
Through the Three Realms and the ten directions.
The immortals of Great Purity,
Stoop to bestow their gracious light.
All are saved—nine generations and seven ancestors,
Leaving the dark night,
Ascending to the immortal realm.
At the Heavenly Prime Assembly,
Myriad spirits rejoice,
All singing *Man Ting Fang*.

*Presented to the Recluse of Guangling Town*
Sacred formulas and immortal methods,
Mysterious mechanisms and wondrous principles,
Transmitted orally, word by word.
Fortunate to receive the master’s instruction,
Revealing what preceded birth.
Silently revolving the celestial cycle,
Witnessing the Pole Star,
Myriad phenomena in flux.
Creating transformation,
True dragon and true tiger,
True mercury and true lead.
At the meeting place of the Yellow Court,
The Five Phases inverted,
The Eight Trigrams interwoven.
Relying on the jade furnace and golden crucible,
Fanned by mighty fire.
When the nine cycles of effort are complete,
The elixir is formed,
Yin exhausted, yang perfected.
The path to longevity,
Neither distant nor near,
Neither lacking nor whole.

*Man Ting Fang* (Three-Character Stanza)
□□ Three Lights,
□□ following the Dao,
□□ spirit guarding cool clarity.
□□ awakening to truth,
Singing afar *Man Ting Fang*.
□□ ascending to court and returning,
□□ nature, □□ light suffused with pure yang.
□□ gazing,
□□ those who hear,
Together with me realize the eternal constant.
□□ I transform,
□□ faithful and compliant,
Fortune and longevity prolonged.
□□ benevolent elixir congeals,
The four great elements round and square.
□□ laughing aloud within brightness,
□□ emerging, widely unfolding auspicious signs.
□□ words,
□□ virtue and power,
Drifting with each step.

*Resplendent Divine Light* (*Sheng Sheng Man*)
Jade concealed in stone,
Pearls hidden in clams,
All depend on the craftsman’s skill.
The true light within the outer shell manifests,
Just as in the primordial beginning.
To illuminate the mind and recognize nature,
Shatter every illusion,
Breaking through to emptiness.
In purity,
Behold the sky like a jade table,
The autumn night’s solitary moon.
Thus the ten directions shine clearly,
Grasping the pivot of yin and yang,
No dust or defilement can restrain.
From ancient times, those who attained,
Entered the wondrous beyond all residue.
Though branches and leaves may be myriad,
With Confucianism, Buddhism, and Daoism,
All dwell in unity.
Ever returning to the One,
Perfectly realizing the absolute,
Attaining the immortal capital.

*Four Songs of Blooming Flowers Along the Path*
All Daoists under heaven,
Truly recognize authentic cultivation.
The nine gates bear no leakage,
Myriad spirits remain.
Golden lead and jade mercury,
Water and fire naturally replenish and withdraw.
The three fields churn with cloudy waves,
Bearing the golden elixir,
The jade person steadily pilots the divine boat.
Heaven and earth purified,
Sun and moon in confluence.
Meritorious deeds fully perfected,
A single numinous true nature abides,
Freely roaming.
The celestial host in full,
Welcoming, guiding by the cloud’s edge.
Vastly transcending the dharma realms,
Manifesting in the human world,
Names recorded in the Jade Register of Great Purity.

*Presented to the Virtuous Assembly of Three Prefectures and Five Gatherings*
Wenshan cradles seven treasures,
Ninghai surges with golden lotuses.
The Three Lights shine together,
The Jade Flower Heaven.
Able to uphold equanimity,
Bearing good karmic fruit.
The five directions refined and elegant,
Harmonious qi brimming,
Transforming into auspicious mists and propitious vapors.
Spouting immortal blossoms,
Fresh through all four seasons.
Radiance beams toward the cloud pavilion.
Gathering the essence of heaven and earth,
Ascending to court at the Origin.
Golden infant and jade maiden,
Silently transmitting inner words.
Myriad spirits all stand listening,
Assembled at Dragon Auspiciousness,
The immortals of the Great Jin’s eastern land.

*Sent to Master Chaoyuan*
Deeply grateful for frequent summons,
Startled and hastening.
The karmic ties of the three prefectures not yet exhausted,
Unable to depart.
Presiding over retreats in various places,
Humbly entrusted with delivering the deluded masses.
Suddenly receiving your fine letter,
Soon to meet in person,
Once more discussing the subtle mysteries.
Well praised,
The root of the Great Dao.
Dispelling the doubts of many hearts.
At the crucial juncture ahead,
Diligently refine and uphold.
Having gathered the mysterious pearl,
From time to time, partake of the elixir.
When the precious flower is fully bloomed,
Piercing the clear sky,
The Jade Capital awaits another auspicious rendezvous.

*Presented to Master Zhou of Wenshan*
Immortal blossoms ever resplendent,
Unfading through the four seasons.
Relying on true water and fire,
Forging the golden essence.
Merits perfected, elixir congealed,
Each step light as colored clouds.
The head full of cool wind and moon,
A single grain of elixir,
Personally treading the immortal path through the great void.
Freely dissolving,
The dusty passions of ten thousand kalpas.
Another fine future lies ahead.
Here, beyond aging and death,
Attaining longevity.
Immortal bearing and Daoist bones,
Naturally sensing the utmost purity.
Myriad streams of the Silver River turn,
Stirring the celestial gate,
The true nature of Great Purity perfectly illuminated.

*Magnolia Flower Curtain*
After the Yellow Register Retreat at the Three Halls Temple in Wang Village, Ganyu County
Freely roaming, carefree and expansive,
A tiny golden mountain for one’s humble abode.
Applying wondrous power to empower,
Conducting the grand retreat,
True sages descending to the altar.
Graceful light universally bestowed upon the lower realms,
Saving the living and the dead,
Delivering them from suffering to join the immortal ranks.
Luminously pervading the composed dharma body,
Dwelling in serene tranquility.
Returning, guiding and expounding the profound,
Deleting all inner and outer affairs.
Gathering the fivefold cool clarity,
Heaven pacified, earth stilled,
Piercing through the three barriers.
August Heaven aids the vast Great Dao,
Delivering all beings,
No species finds it difficult.
Soon, under the golden script’s decree,
Forever parting from the dusty sea of the mundane world.

*A Branch of Flowers* (Elixir Formula)
Universally exhorting fellow practitioners,
Wondrous medicine possessed by all.
The former master personally imparted,
For your cultivation.
A single taste of true heart,
Strike the bonds, let them not flee.
Gentleness as the guide,
Humbly ingest it,
Regardless of before or after meals.

Having swallowed it,
Rejuvenating the old, returning to youth,
All from *Man Ting Fang*.

*After the Yellow Register Retreat, Ascending the Rosy Clouds, Recalling My Master*

Of the lineage of Pure Yang,
Manifesting wonders in due time,
Secretly transmitting the immortal lineage to my master.
Chongyang, in his compassionate transformation,
Left teachings to Ma of Fufeng.
Revolving the mysterious mechanism, following its course,
Perfecting true attainment,
The Three Realms harmoniously merged.
